  • Method Details

    • openShop

      void openShop(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Opens the main shop GUI for a player
      Parameters:
      player - The player to open the shop for

    • openShopSection

      void openShopSection(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, String sectionName)
      Opens a specific shop section for a player
      Parameters:
      player - The player to open the section for
      sectionName - The name of the section (without .yml extension)

    • reloadShop

      CompletableFuture<Boolean> reloadShop()
      Reloads all shop configurations from files/database
      Returns:
      Future that completes with true if successful

    • isShopEnabled

      boolean isShopEnabled()
      Checks if the shop system is enabled

    • getSection

      ShopSection getSection(String sectionName)
      Gets a shop section configuration by name
      Parameters:
      sectionName - The section name
      Returns:
      The shop section, or null if not found

    • getSectionNames

      Collection<String> getSectionNames()
      Gets all available shop section names
      Returns:
      Collection of section names
